extendedInfo.description: Pathfinder, D&D 4E, 3.5E characters supportedFor a limited time, current users and anyone that purchases DnD Buddy get all the features free Including the Spells library, Magic Items library, Feats browser, 3.5 and Pathfinder support.Current Version: Supports creating characters from scratch, exported from D&D Insider online (4E) or even exported from the old software version.This app is optimized for both tablets and handheld screens (it automatically chooses the tablet version if your screen size is larger than 6").  Get the HD and mobile in one app (and install it on both).This app is far less than the cost of one RPG book. Invest in me please?  I'd like to work on this more and I hope you would like to sponsor me a bit.  If you look at this apps history, you'll see in a short period, I've had many significant upgrades.  I'm an independent developer: help me raise a new generation of gamers that love roleplaying and Dungeons and Dragons games as much as we do!Coming soon:This is the first of 3 major updates coming!Almost done GM mode addon...-Encounter tracker-Monster library-Add Monsters from library into encounters-GM view mode: view screen with multiple characters key stats like everyone's perception values, initiative, skills and conditions.Player Tools addon:-Import libraries from Excel spreadsheets... want more spells, feats, or magic items?  Easy import.-Level up your characters and have the app guide you through it-More prestige classes comingOlder version history:v3.8-Automatic dice rollers on Power use.-Surge mod-Added "Racial Traits"-Heroic/Paragon Feats Details added-Dice Roller: click Menu > Dice. "Save" dice coming.Lastly, I obviously can't test on all devices but I'm quick to fix things if you can guide me a bit.  If you want to take part in sending me bugs, go to this twitter handle:http://twitter.com/#!/dnd_buddyhttp://www.facebook.com/dndbuddyhttps://plus.google.com/u/0/105656136943556274699/posts

reviews.title: Not useful for 4e
reviews.comment: Was disappointed with how it worked with both my nexus 7 layout as well as how much of it you had to do by hand with the 4e sheet. This is clearly made for 3.5 and pathfinder, with lesser support of 4e.
reviews.author: Matthew Sucich

reviews.title: Decent App
reviews.comment: Missing monk class and many monk options like wis bonus to AC and ki pool and level bonus to cmb, combat maneuver spelled wrong, cant subtract temporary stat damage, no nonlethal damage option. Im sure theres more but otherwise great app.
reviews.author: matt kerlin

reviews.title: Underwhelming..
reviews.comment: While the features are all present, the actual app itself functions sub par on my phone. The buttons are disjointed and the app slow to load and use (if it hasn\'t hung up yet). While this may be a problem from my phone, it isn\'t worth it for me if I can\'t use it.
reviews.author: Parth Kalia

reviews.title: Great potential!
reviews.comment: Great potential, but could still use some work. I would love to see more added to it. One thing that worries me right now is that it doesn\'t include races and spells from PH2. I play a gray elf Duskblade and it\'s been  bit difficult to transfer my Heroforge sheet to this app. Still great though. Looking forward to future upgrades!
reviews.author: Faisal KH

reviews.title: Constant crashes. Regret buying.
reviews.comment: Crashes and loses character access constantly. Had promise but a waste of money.
reviews.author: Joseph Hughes

reviews.title: Nifty but incomplete
reviews.comment: This seems like a great paper saving app. Is there any way to add custom notes to a character sheet? Reminders that I have bonuses from allies or random encounter related things?   Some kind of \"thought bubble\" feature might be nice for reminders about things...
reviews.author: Adam Goler

reviews.title: Keeps crashing
reviews.comment: If I ever click the top left corner of the app it crashes. It would also be nice if there were pre-saves for characters based on race and class. The spells should be searchable by name somehow.
reviews.author: Gabriel Munoz

reviews.title: Great app some suggestions
reviews.comment: Would love to be able to see companions and minions of say rangers.. they included in the ddi files for 4e but do not display in app
reviews.author: Michael McDonald

reviews.title: Needs a lot of work.....
reviews.comment: I will be watching and waiting for your updates. I will certainly be expecting a GUI update! It is very ugly and awful to navigate. P.s Google play have recently added a refund button. Let us hope, we don\'t have to use it!
reviews.author: Dean Cook

reviews.title: More 4E content
reviews.comment: It is a great app but needs more 4e support.
reviews.author: Flames ninteenthirteen

reviews.title: Best I Have Found
reviews.comment: I like the app and it is worth the money. I am using a Nexus 7.   Suggestions -shrink the size of the stats text,  so the ability scroll area can be increased in size.  -Add long press to the equipment(and maybe others) for editing and equip/drop. - There are still some abilities, like virtue of cunning,  that do not show up.
reviews.author: Robert Kinard

reviews.title: Great app and quick spell look up
reviews.comment: My only complaint is this app doesn\'t have Warlock by default;( other than that my fighter build went awesome on my tablet
reviews.author: Timothy Lundberg

reviews.title: Hunter\'s Quarry
reviews.comment: Just a minor bug/fix, for hunters the details on hunter\'s quarry does not list the extra damage dice. Since that is not in it lead me to wounder if there was some kind of notes, i like to atleast see the title of created notes via thee sheet. Also maybe add the Paragon path and Epic destiny next to my class label.
reviews.author: Patrick Soto

reviews.title: Potential
reviews.comment: While a great start this is a largely unfinished app. Granted you tackled a really tough job. Keep up the good work, im waiting for the monster library.
reviews.author: Josh Tarr

reviews.comment: My phone now may act as a substitute bag of holding
reviews.author: Jesse Goerzen

reviews.title: Nice idea but needs more polish
reviews.comment: Alot of abilities aren\'t fully detailed.  e.g. Armor of sacrifice only has the at-will ability and not the Daily ability  Also marking \"Used and Unused\" is very close to details so it becomes hard to press one without accidently pressing the other.  Apart from that i really like it,
reviews.author: Rick Frost

reviews.title: Great app, but race/class features?
reviews.comment: This is a great app, but (as far as I can tell) there is not a way to put in race/class special features (I.e. breathing underwater). In one of the pictures, it looks like you can, but it dosen\'t seem to actually be in the app. (Its also possible that I\'m really dumb and just managed to miss it)
reviews.author: Miles Chaffin

reviews.title: Average
reviews.comment: this app attempts to do many things, but I think you could use a bit more polish - especially in the user interface. this is the only app attempting to do so much, so props for that!
reviews.author: Andrew Hartman
